subject_labels: RDS cross-region read replicas must use encrypted snapshots with KMS CMK
All IAM roles must follow least privilege with explicit deny statements for unused regions
CloudWatch alarms must trigger SNS notifications to multiple email endpoints
S3 bucket replication must include object metadata and tags
Application Load Balancers must use AWS Certificate Manager certificates in both regions
Route 53 health checks must monitor both primary and secondary endpoints with 30-second intervals
EventBridge rules must coordinate failover orchestration with 5-minute retry intervals
DynamoDB global tables must have contributor insights enabled for both regions
Lambda functions for health monitoring must have dead letter queues configured
